dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.party.IndividualName
dataStructure.description:
A word, term, or phrase by which an individual is known and distinguished from other individuals.A name is an informal way of identifying an object [Fowler]This entity allows for international naming variations. An IndividualName is a type of PartyName.

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: IndividualName

child.name: formattedName
child.description:
Contains, in one string, a fully formatted name with all of its pieces in their proper place. This includes all of the necessary punctuation. This de-normalized form of the name cannot be easily parsed.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: formattedName

child.name: legalName
child.description:
Contains, in one string, a fully formatted name with all of its pieces in their proper place. This includes all of the necessary punctuation

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: legalName

child.name: formOfAddress
child.description:
Contains the Salutation,e.g. Mr., Mrs., Hon., Dr.,Major, etc

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: formOfAddress

child.name: generation
child.description:
e.g. Sr., Jr., III (the third), etc.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: generation

child.name: givenNames
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: givenNames

child.name: preferredGivenName
child.description:
Contains the chosen name by which the person prefers to be addressed. Note: This name may be a name other than a given name, such as a nickname

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: preferredGivenName

child.name: middleNames
child.description:
Middle name(s) or initial(s)

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: middleNames

child.name: familyNamePrefix
child.description:
This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: familyNamePrefix

child.name: familyNames
child.description:
Contains the non-chosen or inherited name. Also known as a person's last name in the Western context.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: familyNames

child.name: familyGeneration
child.description:
i.e. Sr, Jr

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: familyGeneration

child.name: qualifications
child.description:
Contains the letters used to describe academic or other type qualifications held by a person and/or the distinctions conferred upon them. e.g. PhD, MD, CPA, MCSD, etc

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: qualifications

child.name: aristocraticTitle
child.description:
e.g. Baron, Graf, Earl, etc."

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: aristocraticTitle

child.name: individual
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..1

This association end has aggregation shared

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association IndividualIsNamedUsing

This association end is optional
child.label: individual
